title: Sober and useful reflections upon a treatise of Mr. Richard Baxter's stiled, (Sacrilegious desertion of the holy ministry rebuked, and tolerated preaching of the Gospel vindicated) with a most serious preface to the same, out of the said Mr. Baxter. ...
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691. Sacrilegious desertion of the holy ministry rebuked.
